about_the_game:
A Kirby-inspired 2D platformer game where you can absorb the aliens that try to attack you.

Something odd has arrived and is taking the color away…

A race of extraterrestrial beings known as the Voidlings crash onto earth. Keena befriends a lone Voidling she calls Moku which accompanies her on her journey to save her brother. Like the other Voidlings, Moku can absorb objects and use their likeness to navigate the world in different ways. Join Keena and Moku as they join forces in Keena the Voidslayer!
detailed_description:
A Kirby-inspired 2D platformer game where you can absorb the aliens that try to attack you.

Something odd has arrived and is taking the color away…

A race of extraterrestrial beings known as the Voidlings crash onto earth. Keena befriends a lone Voidling she calls Moku which accompanies her on her journey to save her brother. Like the other Voidlings, Moku can absorb objects and use their likeness to navigate the world in different ways. Join Keena and Moku as they join forces in Keena the Voidslayer!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Linux distribution released after 2016
  • Processor: x86_32 CPU with SSE2 instructions, x86_64 CPU, ARMv7 or ARMv8 CPU
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 2500 (Ivy Bridge), AMD Radeon R5 Graphics (Kaveri)
  • Storage: 150 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.13 (Compatibility) or macOS 10.15 (Forward+/Mobile)
  • Processor: x86_64 or ARM CPU (Apple Silicon)
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 2500 (Ivy Bridge), AMD Radeon R5 Graphics (Kaveri)
  • Storage: 150 MB available space

name: Keena The Voidslayer

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: x86_32 CPU with SSE2 instructions, or any x86_64 CPU
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 2500 (Ivy Bridge), AMD Radeon R5 Graphics (Kaveri)
  • Storage: 150 MB available space

short_description: A 2-D action adventure platformer where you can absorb and manipulate things with your friend Moku. You can use different abilities to explore and interact with the world.
